room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Did the "Great Room" with a group of six. We came so close... but didn't end up escaping. It was so much fun! Our guide Steve was awesome. Overall a fantastic experience - we will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: The haunted house was really fun and I loved the spinning room but the escape room is where it is at!!! We did the great room and had sooo much fun. The actors were so great and stayed in character the whole time and we needed them! Going back this weekend for the other escape room!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: I was part of the group within Saturday's Great Room Escape. I enjoyed every moment! The tasks weren't simplistic, the actors awesome, and the fun continued with the epic haunt house afterward. We will be there again!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Had tons of fun! We did the Great Room, wasn't too scary but startling! We made it out with 9 minutes left.

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Went to the Great Room (one of the escape rooms) on a double date. It was fantastic and so much fun! A good number of puzzles, and challenging while being amazingly entertaining. I can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Needed a bit of help to get going but once we did, it was an awesome experience. We fell short from escaping "The Great Room" but would have had it with an extra 5 minutes. Can't wait to go back and try the other 2 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: We went to do the escape room yesterday. We had a total of 8 people in “The Great Room” and we never played an escape room before. It was very challenging but we made it out with a little more than 6 minutes left! It was so much fun. Will definitely return.
